body.name: Olive Green Pinch Pleated Cotton Linen Curtains for Living Room 2 Panels,Boho Farmhouse Semi Sheer Curtains Back Tab/Clip Rings Spring Home Decor for Bedroom,84 inch Long Window Treatment
features: 🛒【Custom Design Fabric】To reduce budget while keeping the linen/cotton organic characteristics,Designer makes this stone-washed ultra soft yet linen look blended fabric - 20% cotton,20 linen,60% polyester.It drapes well,medium thick,airy and breathable in hot summer.Each package includes 2 panels of pinch pleated curtain with 16 hooks,measuring 40"Wx84"L each panel.

🛒【Pinch Pleats Design】Each curtain panel with 7 pinch pleats generates modern and luxury feel.Linen curtains provide a natural,organic,and textured look that complements a variety of interior styles.By offering linen curtains in various colors,patterns,and lengths,we can cater to customers looking for a casual yet sophisticated window treatment.The simple yet stylish draperies add a touch of sophistication for modern living spaces.Hanging these pinch pleat curtains to elevate your windows and increase the aesthetic value to any spaces,bedroom,living room,nursery,office,etc.
🛒【Semi Sheer and Reduce Sun Glare】Experience the perfect balance of natural light and privacy.The drapery panels allow gentle sunlight filter through while providing privacy from prying eyes.

🛒【Multiple Hanging Ways】Rustic Casual curtains have 3 hanging options to meet your different home décor needs.Method 1: There are 16 hooks that can be hooked to the window slide，The adjustable hook can raise and lower the height of the curtain by 1inch，The adjust. Method 2: Can be hung on the hanging ring at home (this product does not include the hanging ring). Method 3:Use back tab to hide the curtain rod

🛒【Easy Care】Sold as 2 Pieces.Machine wash in cold water.No bleach.Tumble dry low.Iron with warm temperature if wrinkled.Please allow color differential on under different time or light just as wall paints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I used these for my bed canopy and it turned out perfect. It’s a great off-white color, not too yellow or brown but also not too white. It also isn’t too sheer against a wall which I was initially worried about. On top of that, I loved the pinch pleats and the fact that I didn’t have to buy rings or clips for it to have that look. I wish I had bought these for my bedroom curtains too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very cute! Saw these on an instagram account and bought them. They were everything I hoped for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I love the pinch pleated details on this
reviews.reviewText: I should have read the description on this more carefully. Looking at the picture, I thought it was white. Fortunately the merchant does offer this in white & I'll likely pick several up in that color.That said, these are very pretty curtains. I especially like the pinch pleats along the top. It gives the curtain a more formal appearance, but the semi-sheer, natural blend of the fabric offers a more relaxed vibe. It's nice. It's a nice change from heavy, formal curtains, sheers and more cafe curtain type designs.Last year, I saw a very pretty room decorating idea in Better Homes & Gardens. The room was painted a pale blue & the windows were decorated with pinch pleated white curtains. The bedspread & other soft furnishings were simple blue & white patterns. In the photo the curtains were more formal, heavy, lined drapes. I prefer a more relaxed environment, especially in the bedroom & these are perfect. They're crisp enough to make a statement, but not so stiff as to be stuffy-looking.I bought the bedspread, pillow shams & other soft furnishings immediately when I found items that I really liked. But I haven't been able to find pinch pleated drapes that weren't lined &heavy, until I found these drapes. I just love the linen look, with it's more casual feel. Now I can finally finish up with the bedroom renovation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great curtains and beautiful
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased these curtains for my home, and I must say, they have exceeded my expectations. The pinch pleats along the top add a touch of formality while maintaining a relaxed vibe, making them perfect for creating a cozy environment in my bedroom. Unlike heavy, formal curtains or cafe designs, these curtains strike the right balance.Setting them up was a breeze, and the classic, neutral style seamlessly fits into any room's decor. My daughter loves them in her room, and their sheer quality allows a beautiful play of natural light. The panels have a nice weight to them, and the fabric gives off a high-end curtain appearance with a soft, linen-like feel.Wrinkles are easily smoothed out, and considering the quality, the price feels like a steal. The flexibility and sturdiness of the linen used instill confidence in their durability. They offer a variety of lengths, so measuring carefully is essential to ensure a perfect fit.While they don't completely block out light, they do a commendable job of making sunlight more tolerable and pleasant. The natural light cream shade is simply stunning, adding a touch of elegance to my home. I used a tension rod and purchased separate curtain rings for hanging, and the pleated/pinched look was ready to go without any steaming needed.In conclusion, these curtains are a fantastic addition to my home. Their quality, appearance, and affordability make them a standout choice, and I'm now a fan of this brand. If you're looking for curtains that blend style, functionality, and comfort, these are a top-notch option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Curtains but Didn't Work Out For Me
reviews.reviewText: First, let me say, these are very nice quality curtains. They didn't work out for me because the color was slightly warmer than what I needed to match the rest of the room. They are not blackout curtains so a bit of light does come through, which can affect how the color is portrayed. I wanted something like this, with just the linen and no blackout material, but unfortunately, the color still didn't quite work out. Otherwise, beautiful, well made curtains.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These panels look great in my daughter's room. She loves them. Very classic and neutral, they can go with any decor in the room. Very east to set up. They are sheer so don't expect them to keep light out, but they are very pretty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These curtains are beautiful. I love them. They have a nice weight to them and the fabric looks like high end curtains. The sheerness is just right. These curtains definitely look and feel like linen. Wrinkles are very easy to get out. The price is a steal for the quality you get.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately these curtains came damaged -There was a huge pull in one of the threads, directly in the center. If not for that, they’d have gotten a higher rating. They’re soft, the color is gorgeous, and they’re thick enough to block a substantial amount of light without being completely blackout curtains. I was able to fix the pull for the most part, and they look great in my living room, so I won’t complaint too terribly much, but the was kind of a bummer to open my new curtain and see they weren’t in perfect condition.
